[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "
Proprietory ID: {{ doc.name }}
Proprietory Article Certificate
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Date: {{ doc.posting_date or frappe.utils.nowdate() }}
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
1 Description of item type, Model No including general specifications {{ doc.description or "" }}
2 Name of the manufacturer / supplier of the item suggested by the Indenter {{ doc.manufacturer or "" }}
3 Is the item a spare part, attachment or accessory for an existing equipment {{ doc.is_spare_part or "" }}
4 Is there any other known manufacturer / supplier of this item in the market {{ doc.other_known_suppliers or "" }}
5 If the answer is “Yes” for item 4 above, why same is not considered?
(Indenter must bring out comparative mandatory advantages of the item selected from the type(s) offered by other manufacturers). 		{{ doc.reason_for_not_selecting_others or "." }}
6 If in the knowledge of the Indenter, there is no other manufacturer/supplier of this item and if the item is of a recurring nature, Why public/limited tender cannot be issued to locate possibly more suppliers? {{ doc.recurring_nature_reason or "" }}
7 Any other justification for procuring the item from a single source. {{ doc.other_justification or "" }}
"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
  1. The item at sl.no.1 is required to be procured on proprietary basis, as the source of supply is definitely known.
  2. The specified brand proposed has advantages in meeting our functional requirements.
"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
Raised by Indenter Verified by Department Head
In view of the justification given above, requirement of PT / LT is waived.
Recommended by / Not Recommended by Approved by / Not Approved by



MANAGING DIRECTOR
"}]
name: Proprietory Article Certificate
